dcterms:description: A freely accessible critical care database containing records of 53,423 distinct hospital admissions of adults to an intensive care unit between 2001 and 2012, structured in 26 tables including vital signs, observations of care providers, and diagnostic codes.
dcterms:title: MIMIC-III

dcterms:creator: O. Uzuner
B. R. South
S. Shen
S. L. DuVall
dcterms:description: A dataset used for evaluating clinical concept extraction, derived from the 2010 i2b2/VA challenge, which focuses on concepts, assertions, and relations in clinical text.
dcterms:title: i2b2/VA

dcterms:creator: M. Herrero-Zazo
I. Segura-Bedmar
P. Martínez
T. Declerck
dcterms:description: An annotated corpus containing pharmacological substances and drug-drug interactions, used for drug name recognition tasks.
dcterms:title: DrugBank

dcterms:creator: M. Herrero-Zazo
I. Segura-Bedmar
P. Martínez
T. Declerck
dcterms:description: An annotated corpus containing pharmacological substances and drug-drug interactions, used for drug name recognition tasks.
dcterms:title: MedLine
